verses.verse: And he began <S%G756><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> to them by parables. <S%G3850><s%> A certain man <S%G444><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and set <S%G4060><s%> an hedge <S%G5418><s%> about <S%G5418><s%> it, and dig <S%G3736><s%> a place for the winefat, <S%G5276><s%> and built <S%G3618><s%> a tower, <S%G4444><s%> and let <S%G1554><s%> it out to farmers, <S%G1092><s%> and went <S%G589><s%> into a far country. <S%G589><s%>

And at the season <S%G2540><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> to the farmers <S%G1092><s%> a servant, <S%G1401><s%> that he might receive <S%G2983><s%> from the farmers <S%G1092><s%> of the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
And they caught <S%G2983><s%> him, and beat <S%G1194><s%> him, and sent <S%G649><s%> him away <S%G649><s%> empty. <S%G2756><s%>

And again <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> to them another <S%G243><s%> servant; <S%G1401><s%> and at him they cast <S%G3036><s%> stones, <S%G3036><s%> and wounded him in the head, <S%G2775><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> him away <S%G649><s%> shamefully <S%G821><s%> handled. <S%G821><s%>

And again <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> another; <S%G243><s%> and him they killed, <S%G615><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> others; <S%G243><s%> beating <S%G1194><s%> some, <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> and killing <S%G615><s%> some. <S%G3588><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> son, <S%G5207><s%> his well beloved, <S%G27><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> him also <S%G2532><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> They will reverence <S%G1788><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>

But those <S%G1565><s%> farmers <S%G1092><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the heir; <S%G2818><s%> come, <S%G1205><s%> let us kill <S%G615><s%> him, and the inheritance <S%G2817><s%> shall be our's. <S%G2257><s%>
And they took <S%G2983><s%> him, and killed <S%G615><s%> him, and cast <S%G1544><s%> him out of the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> shall therefore <S%G3767><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> do? <S%G4160><s%> he will come <S%G2064><s%> and destroy <S%G622><s%> the farmers, <S%G1092><s%> and will give <S%G1325><s%> the vineyard <S%G290><s%> to others. <S%G243><s%>

And have you not read <S%G314><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> scripture; <S%G1124><s%> The stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the builders <S%G3618><s%> rejected <S%G593><s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> the head <S%G2776><s%> of the corner: <S%G1137><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> was the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> doing, <S%G1096><s%> and it is marvelous <S%G2298><s%> in our eyes? <S%G3788><s%>

And they sought <S%G2212><s%> to lay hold <S%G2902><s%> on him, but feared <S%G5399><s%> the people: <S%G3793><s%> for they knew <S%G1097><s%> that he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> them: and they left <S%G863><s%> him, and went <S%G565><s%> their way.
And they send <S%G649><s%> to him certain <S%G5100><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and of the Herodians, <S%G2265><s%> to catch <S%G64><s%> him in his words. <S%G3056><s%>

And when they were come, <S%G2064><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that you are <S%G1488><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> and care <S%G3199><s%> for no <S%G3762><s%> man: <S%G444><s%> for you regard <S%G991><s%> not the person <S%G4383><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> but teach <S%G1321><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in truth: <S%G225><s%> Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> tribute <S%G2778><s%> to Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> not?

Shall we give, <S%G1325><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> shall we not give? <S%G1325><s%> But he, knowing <S%G1492><s%> their hypocrisy, <S%G5272><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> tempt <S%G3985><s%> you me? bring <S%G5342><s%> me a penny, <S%G1220><s%> that I may see <S%G1492><s%> it.

And they brought <S%G5342><s%> it. And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Whose <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> and superscription? <S%G1923><s%> And they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Caesar's. <S%G2541><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Render <S%G591><s%> to Caesar <S%G2541><s%> the things that are Caesar's, <S%G2541><s%> and to God <S%G2316><s%> the things that are God's. <S%G2316><s%> And they marveled <S%G2296><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> him.

Then <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to him the Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> there is no <S%G3361><s%> resurrection; <S%G386><s%> and they asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Master, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> to us, If <S%G1437><s%> a man's <S%G5100><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> die, <S%G599><s%> and leave <S%G2641><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> behind <S%G2641><s%> him, and leave <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> that his brother <S%G80><s%> should take <S%G2983><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> and raise <S%G1817><s%> up seed <S%G4690><s%> to his brother. <S%G80><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> there were seven <S%G2033><s%> brothers: <S%G80><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> a wife, <S%G1135><s%> and dying <S%G599><s%> left <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> seed. <S%G4690><s%>
And the second <S%G1208><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> her, and died, <S%G599><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> left <S%G863><s%> he any seed: <S%G4690><s%> and the third <S%G5154><s%> likewise. <S%G5615><s%>

And the seven <S%G2033><s%> had <S%G2983><s%> her, and left <S%G863><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> seed: <S%G4690><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> died <S%G599><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

In the resurrection <S%G386><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they shall rise, <S%G450><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> shall she be of them? for the seven <S%G2033><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> her to wife. <S%G1135><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Do you not therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> err, <S%G4105><s%> because you know <S%G1492><s%> not the scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

For when <S%G3752><s%> they shall rise <S%G450><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> they neither <S%G3777><s%> marry, <S%G1060><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> are given in marriage; <S%G1061><s%> but are as the angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And as touching <S%G4012><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> that they rise: <S%G1453><s%> have you not read <S%G314><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> how <S%G5613><s%> in the bush <S%G942><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am the God <S%G2316><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of Jacob? <S%G2384><s%>
He is not the God <S%G2316><s%> of the dead, <S%G3498><s%> but the God <S%G2316><s%> of the living: <S%G2198><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> do greatly <S%G4183><s%> err. <S%G4105><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the scribes <S%G1122><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> and having heard <S%G191><s%> them reasoning <S%G4802><s%> together, <S%G4802><s%> and perceiving <S%G1492><s%> that he had answered <S%G611><s%> them well, <S%G2573><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, Which <S%G4169><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> of all? <S%G3956><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, The first <S%G4413><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> is, Hear, <S%G191><s%> O Israel; <S%G2474><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> our God <S%G2316><s%> is one <S%G1520><s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

And you shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind, <S%G1271><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your strength: <S%G2479><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>

And the second <S%G1208><s%> is like, <S%G3664><s%> namely this, <S%G3778><s%> You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%> There is none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> than these. <S%G5130><s%>

And the scribe <S%G1122><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Well, <S%G2573><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> you have said <S%G2036><s%> the truth: <S%G225><s%> for there is one <S%G1520><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and there is none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> but he:

And to love <S%G25><s%> him with all <S%G3650><s%> the heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> the understanding, <S%G4907><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> the soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> the strength, <S%G2479><s%> and to love <S%G25><s%> his neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as himself, <S%G1438><s%> is more <S%G4119><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> whole <S%G3646><s%> burnt <S%G3646><s%> offerings <S%G3646><s%> and sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that he answered <S%G611><s%> discreetly, <S%G3562><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You are <S%G1488><s%> not far <S%G3112><s%> from the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> And no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> after <S%G3765><s%> that dared <S%G5111><s%> ask <S%G1905><s%> him any question.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> while he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> that Christ <S%G5547><s%> is the son <S%G5207><s%> of David? <S%G1138><s%>

For David <S%G1138><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> by the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> The LORD <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> you on <S%G1537><s%> my right <S%G1188><s%> hand, till <S%G2193><s%> I make <S%G5087><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> your footstool. <S%G5286><s%>

David <S%G1138><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> calls <S%G3004><s%> him Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and from where <S%G4159><s%> is he then his son? <S%G5207><s%> And the common <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> him gladly. <S%G2234><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them in his doctrine, <S%G1322><s%> Beware <S%G991><s%> of the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> love <S%G2309><s%> to go <S%G4043><s%> in long clothing, <S%G4749><s%> and love salutations <S%G783><s%> in the marketplaces, <S%G58><s%>
And the chief <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and the uppermost <S%G4411><s%> rooms <S%G4411><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> feasts: <S%G1173><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> widows' <S%G5503><s%> houses, <S%G3614><s%> and for a pretense <S%G4392><s%> make <S%G4336><s%> long <S%G3117><s%> prayers: <S%G4336><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> greater <S%G4055><s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> over <S%G2713><s%> against <S%G2713><s%> the treasury, <S%G1049><s%> and beheld <S%G2334><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> money <S%G5475><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the treasury: <S%G1049><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> that were rich <S%G4145><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> in much. <S%G4183><s%>

And there came <S%G2064><s%> a certain <S%G1520><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow, <S%G5503><s%> and she threw <S%G906><s%> in two <S%G1417><s%> mites, <S%G3016><s%> which <S%G2076><s%> make <S%G1510><s%> a farthing. <S%G2835><s%>

And he called <S%G4341><s%> to him his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That this <S%G3778><s%> poor <S%G4434><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> has cast <S%G906><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> in, than all <S%G3956><s%> they which have cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the treasury: <S%G1049><s%>

For all <S%G3956><s%> they did cast <S%G906><s%> in of their abundance; <S%G4052><s%> but she of her want <S%G5304><s%> did cast <S%G906><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> that she had, <S%G2192><s%> even all <S%G3650><s%> her living. <S%G979><s%>
